Package API

Class WebManager

java.lang.Object
API.WebManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Webservice
public class WebManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements Webservice
Class: java.API.WebManager

Makes calls to the TMB API, and sends the required parameters and gets the reply from the API as a Json String

See Also:
Webservice, JsonLocationReader, JsonStopsReader, JsonStationReader, JsonLineReader, JsonRouteReader

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    WebManager()
    constructs an empty web manager that is ready to be used with it's attributes initialized, and that app ID specified.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.String callAllStations()
    calls all the stations supported by the TMB API
    java.lang.String callAllStops()
    calls all the Bus stops supported by the TMB API
    java.lang.String callLine​(java.lang.String stopId)
    calls the TMB API to get all the Bus Lines waiting time, considering only the Bus lines that stop at the specified stop.
    java.lang.String callRoute​(Route route)
    calls the TMB API in order to get the route with all the possible itineraries to connect the origin with the destination

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • WebManager

      public WebManager()
      constructs an empty web manager that is ready to be used with it's attributes initialized, and that app ID specified.

  • Method Details

    • callAllStations

      public java.lang.String callAllStations()
      calls all the stations supported by the TMB API
      Specified by:
      callAllStations in interface Webservice
      Returns:
      a Json String with all the stations that are stored in the TMB API if there was no problem with the connection, or there is no missing parameters, null otherwise

    • callAllStops

      public java.lang.String callAllStops()
      calls all the Bus stops supported by the TMB API
      Specified by:
      callAllStops in interface Webservice
      Returns:
      a Json String with all the Bus stops stored in the TMB API if there was no problems with the connection or any missing parameter, null> otherwise.

    • callRoute

      public java.lang.String callRoute​(Route route)
      calls the TMB API in order to get the route with all the possible itineraries to connect the origin with the destination
      Specified by:
      callRoute in interface Webservice
      Parameters:
      route - contains all information and parameters needed by the API to get the route
      Returns:
      a Json String with the requested route if exists, null otherwise

    • callLine

      public java.lang.String callLine​(java.lang.String stopId)
      calls the TMB API to get all the Bus Lines waiting time, considering only the Bus lines that stop at the specified stop.
      Specified by:
      callLine in interface Webservice
      Parameters:
      stopId - the stop id of the requested stop
      Returns:
      a Json String with all the information about the Bus lines at the specified stop, and it returns null> if the stop id is invalid or if something went wrong
